Article.ArticleTitle: Learning from long COVID: conceptualising action to tackle infection-associated non-communicable diseases.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: School of Primary Care, Population Sciences and Medical Education, Faculty of Medicine, University of Southampton, Southampton SO16 6YD, UK; University Hospital Southampton NHS Foundation Trust, Southampton, UK. Electronic address: n.a.alwan@soton.ac.uk.
Research and Development Service, VA St Louis Health Care System, St Louis, MO, USA.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: NAA has lived experience of long COVID and reports grants from National Institute for Health and Care Research for long COVID research (STIMULATE-ICP and Hi-COVE studies), is a Long Covid Kids Charity Champion and Long Covid Support Charity Scientific Advisor, and has contributed in an advisory capacity to WHO and the EU Commission's Expert Panel on effective ways of investing in health meetings in relation to post-COVID-19 condition. ZA-A declares no competing interests. The views expressed in this Comment are those of the authors and do not necessarily represent the views of their employers.
